title: Australian diary. No. 053
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: ugly crocodile hides become things of beauty; timber is a big industry in Western Australia; the tobacco industry in Western Australia is examined and the “Tour of the West” a gruelling cycling marathon is shown.
